ğŸ’ With [webdom](https://webdom.market/) exiting beta, we are closing the daily bonus in our mini-app. All previously accumulated WebPoints **will be credited to the wallet balance.**

Previously, users could receive +300 WebPoints daily just for updating the [**WEB3 Portal.**](https://t.me/tondnsclub/app) Now weâ€™re moving to the next level: new missions, tasks, and rewards that truly move things forward.

**webdom officially exits beta**

ğŸ¥‡ The audit is complete, and the report is in! **Our smart contracts on Tolk have passed an independent review. **During the audit, one critical issue was found and immediately fixed. Final result: no vulnerabilities.

ğŸ‘ Weâ€™ve been waiting for this moment since March: hundreds of bugfixes, new features, stress tests, migration of contracts to Tolk, and a month-long audit are now behind us. Today, webdom is a fundamental and reliable product within the TON ecosystem.

**ğŸ‘**** Official confirmation from the auditors:
**
ğŸ”£ Contracts are safe from external message attacks.
ğŸ”£ Balances cannot be drained via gas exploits or unsafe calls.
ğŸ”£ A robust mechanism for deal finalization and fund return is in place.
ğŸ”£ Only proven TON constructions are used.
ğŸ”£
**ğŸ”£**** Our contracts on Tolk are open source:**
github.com/webdom-market/webdom-contracts

ğŸ The audit was prepared by a team with experience in TON and TVM, also the creators of @bidask â€” V3 DEX on TON:
